name: SODIUM CHLORIDE 0.9%
indications: INDICATIONS It is used to regulate the balance of water and electrolytes in the body.
warningsAndPrecautions: PRECAUTIONS Use with caution in the following cases: CD Edematous diseases, such as nephrotic syndrome, cirrhosis, ascites, congestive heart failure, acute left heart failure, brain edema, and idiopathic edema Acute renal failure, oliguria stage, chronic renal failure, urine volume decreased, and poor response to diuretic drugs Hypertension Hypokalemia Follow-up examination: CD Serum sodium, potassium, chlorine concentration Blood acid-base balance index Kidney function Blood pressure Cardiopulmonary function
adverseReactions: ADVERSE REACTIONS Excessive and rapid infusion can cause water and sodium retention, edema, elevated blood pressure, rapid heart rate, chest tightness, dyspnea, and even acute left heart failure.
